text:
Hello. I received several receipts for credit card payments made to JuliaHub for trying out the Run code feature on the cloud. I have, however, not seen any sign of the 25 dollar credit I was supposed to get. How can I see a full accounting of my JuliaHub billing?

Thanks,
doug

elements.text:
Hello. I received several receipts for credit card payments made to JuliaHub for trying out the Run code feature on the cloud. I have, however, not seen any sign of the 25 dollar credit I was supposed to get. How can I see a full accounting of my JuliaHub billing?

Thanks,
doug

text: Hi Doug, the CC charges should be after the credit is applied automatically. I'll get someone to double check and send you a full accounting. More accessible usage reports are a work in progress.

elements.text: Hi Doug, the CC charges should be after the credit is applied automatically. I'll get someone to double check and send you a full accounting. More accessible usage reports are a work in progress.
